summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Valentine's/Birthday love website. All interactive features, animations, and mobile responsiveness working perfectly. Full user journey from intro to final surprise tested successfully.

minor_issues.impact: Visual controls work perfectly, but no actual audio plays
minor_issues.note: Expected behavior with placeholder audio path

passed_tests: Intro screen loads with floating hearts animation
NO button dodges on hover/click interactions
YES button triggers confetti animation and navigates to messages
All 4 message cards flip on tap to reveal romantic messages
Photo section displays 4 placeholder images with captions
Music player controls work (play/pause, vinyl spinning animation)
Mini game option selection and response display works
Calendar displays February 2025 with Valentine's Day (Feb 14) highlighted
Final surprise shows birthday message with heart burst animation
Restart button returns to beginning successfully
All animations work smoothly (floating hearts, confetti, card flip, vinyl spin, heart burst)
